paragraph.paragraph: EiffelStudio editor includes new features designed to help write Eiffel code. Automatic completion is one of those. This feature is available in three contexts:

list.item: 10_syntax_autocomplete.xml when the user types some expression defined in the Eiffel language .

link.label: when the user enters a feature call.

list.item: 30_class_name_autocomplete.xmlwhen the user enters a class name.

paragraph.paragraph:
As, regarding automatic completion, expectations vary from one individual to another, this
